game.model

Class ChessBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • game.model.ChessBoard

  • public class ChessBoard
extends java.util.Observable
    A model of a Chess Board. Each of the tiles represented by integers.
    Author:
    Andreas Nylund, Hanna Granholm

      • toString

        Returns:

      • getColorMatrix

        public int[][] getColorMatrix(int color)
        Creates a matrix representation of the board in black and white.

        The returned matrix will display 1 for each piece which color != color and -1 for each piece which color == color. And 0 for each empty tile.

        Parameters:
        color - The color of interest.
        Returns:
        A representation of the board in only colors.

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clears the board of all pieces.
